descriptionHtml:
Name: Eldrid's Armor Mashup UNP
Version: 1.1
Author: anka01


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Skyrim SE [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/5248?]Eldrids Armor Mashup UNP[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=3]Update[/size]
- Version 1.1 added straps for thr right arm and fixes issues with armor value
of gloves and chain gauntlets
- Version 1.2 same as v1.1 but
includes the recolored shirt and belt by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5721181/?]Maeldun0[/url] ... Thanks for this, it's real nice :)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I’ve made this outfit only for my character and so there is only UNP version available. 
I was not sure whether light armor or clothing, but I have decided it's an light armor. 
What ever, I don't want stupid discussions about this. The outfit can be crafted at any 
forge under 'misc' and can be improved and enchanted (the amulet under jewelry section)!

Each item of the outfit is separately, meaning you can wear what you want, because
(you know) I like to combine different things from other UNP mods.

This outfit is female only, for one simple reason: the originals were as well.

The mod includes a shirt, chainbracers left and right, some leather arm straps, my version
of talos amulet, 2 leatherpants (black and brown), a belt, gauntlets and boots.

This mod is my own version of different mods. Here are the mods I use some meshes from:
- uses meshes from Petrovich's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16658/?]UNP Simply Clothes[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13061/?]UNP Jewelry[/url] mods
- uses meshes from RAN46’s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27073/?]RANs FFT-Archer UNP[/url] mod
- uses the glove mesh from Neovinci’s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14642/?]Neo Oriental Dress[/url] mod
- uses the trouser mesh from SydneyB’s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14146/?]Ashara Dimonized Dress and Jewelry[/url] mod again
- uses a part of a texture from TheGreenLion’s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2859 ]Ancient Nord Armor - Chainmail[/url] mod
- uses a part of a texture from Cabal's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url] mod
- uses vanilla meshes from Bethesda Skyrim, Dawnguard
... and retextured all meshes!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Requirements:

The armor requires the
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP body replacer[/url]


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation:

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher and check the EC Clothes.esp in the Data Files section


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Uninstall

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known Issues

- small clipping issues with the chainbracers in some poses.
- no 1st person by chainbracers


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:
Petrovich
RAN46
anano
NPR

SydneyB
Neovinci
TheGreenLion
Cabal

Bethesda
oweerhardsson for beta testing
Maeldun0 for recolored shirt and belt
Tools used: Blender, NifSkope, GIMP

Thanks to all of you!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Permissions
You may NOT re-upload or use this mod without my permission.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for downloading, and I hope you enjoy!
If you do not like my armor mashup, feel free to just not download it.



Thank you all for your great Videos!!!

[youtube]piZDCINPDo0#t=99[/youtube][youtube]F4E2S-zgEo4[/youtube] [youtube]oNM1wTOdaoU[/youtube] [youtube]0qTK-3aRrpw[/youtube]
author: anka01
